fields.name: Arduino Nano
fields.description: Arduino Nano is a small, complete, and breadboard-friendly board based on the ATmega328 (Arduino Nano 3.x). It has more or less the same functionality of the Arduino Duemilanove, but in a different package.

fields.name: Arduino + Raspberry Pi Kit
fields.description: This kit includes an Arduino board and Raspberry Pi for those looking to experiment with both platforms. Ideal for educational purposes and advanced hobbyists.
